name: Fresh Tilled Soil
description:
Fresh Tilled Soil is an experience and interface design company at the forefront of creating digital products and facilitating Innovation Sprints for product validation or (sometimes more importantly) invalidation.
 
We work with companies of all different sizes and in different industry verticals.  The one commonality between each and everyone is that they put their users first and put a priority on easy to use and beautiful digital interfaces. We start with user research and it sits at the center of our process, we’ll talk with users to create foundational artifacts like detailed persons, experience maps, service blueprints, jobs to be done documents that then influence wire-frames and prototypes we can use for testing our assumptions.  During our UX process we’ll work on design exploration activities for the digital UI by creating style tiles and mood boards which inform the product or websites visual interaction. Once we’re finished it all comes together to delight your users and make your business more successful.
